page.title: 15Houses Around Stockbridge
page.content: { An Old House:}My house is about{300 years old. It is a lovely old house with one acre of land and a river at the end to swim in.It has{4 bedrooms , a{bathroom,}2{lounges,}a{kitchen}and an{attic room.}In the lounges there are beams on the ceiling,and the bedroom in the attic has sloping walls and beams.The house is made of brick,but it was first made of wattle and mud and bits are still there. { A Modern House:}My house was built in 1973 it is{semi-detached}and is made of{brick with a slate roof.}The garage is joined to the house.The garage door is green and the other paintwork is white. Downstairs we have a{kitchen,}a{living {room}and two{porches.}There are a {bathroom}and{three bedrooms}upstairs, one is for the parents and two for the children.
